H3.text: what is the full form of cfc 's. Chlorofluorocarbons

A4.text: Chlorofluorocarbons (CFCs) and hydrochlorofluorocarbons (HCFCs) are fully or partly halogenated hydrocarbons that contain carbon (C), hydrogen (H), chlorine (Cl), and fluorine (F).

A5.text: Process using pyrolysis in an ultra high temperature plasma arc, for the elimination of CFCs
